name: relopab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: relopabi(s0, s1, copab(s0, s1, w0), w0)
stmt.pretty: relopabi(s0, s1, { < s0, s1 > | w0 }, w0)

body.origin:
|- wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0))
-| wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(copab(s0, s1, w0))
-| wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w0))

body.origin: |- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s0, s1, w0))

comment: A class of ordered pairs is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-1995.) Remove disjoint variable conditions. (Revised by Alan Sare, 9-Jul-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)
